title: Set up Creatio.ai add-in for Microsoft Outlook
content_markdown:
Version: 8.3
On this page
After the system administrator performs preliminary setup, you can configure Creatio.ai in your Microsoft Outlook client. In general, the setup of Creatio.ai add-in consists of the following steps:
1. Install Creatio.ai add-in. Learn more: [Read more >>>](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2618#title-2618-1)
2. Grant Microsoft Outlook access to Creatio [Read more >>>](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2618#title-2618-5)
After you install the add-in for Outlook, it will also become available for Microsoft Teams.
## 1\. Install Creatio.ai add-in​
You can install the **Creatio.ai** add-in for Outlook in one of the following ways:
* from Microsoft Outlook for a new Outlook desktop app or Outlook Web. Read more >>>
* from Microsoft Outlook for a classic Outlook desktop app. Read more >>>
* directly from Microsoft Marketplace. Read more >>>
### Install Creatio.ai add-in from Microsoft Outlook for a new Outlook desktop app or Outlook Web​
1. **Open the Outlook desktop app or** [Outlook Web](https://outlook.office365.com/mail/).
2. **Open the Add-ins for Outlook page**. To do this, go to the Outlook navigation panel → click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/icn_more_apps_desktop.png) → **Add apps**. This opens the **Apps** page (Fig. 1).
Fig. 1 Apps page
![Fig. 1 Apps page](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_apps_page.png)
3. **Find the Creatio.ai add-in**. To do this, go to the **Search apps and more** field → enter the "Creatio.ai" search query → select the **Creatio.ai** add-in. This opens the **Creatio.ai add-in** window (Fig. 2).
Fig. 2 Creatio.ai add-in window
![Fig. 2 Creatio.ai add-in window](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_add_in_page.png)
4. **Click Add**. The installation might take some time.
**As a result** :
* The **Creatio.ai** add-in will be added to the **Apps** menu (Fig. 3). Use Creatio.ai when working with a single email or the message list.
Fig. 3 Creatio.ai add-in in the Apps menu
![Fig. 3 Creatio.ai add-in in the Apps menu](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_add_in_in_the_apps_window.png)
* The "Creatio.ai" group that includes the **Creatio.ai** button will be added to the **Event** tab on the **New event** window (Fig. 4). Use Creatio.ai when working with a single event in a separate window.
Fig. 4 Creatio.ai add-in in the New event window
![Fig. 4 Creatio.ai add-in in the New event window](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_add_in_in_the_event_window.png)
### Install Creatio.ai add-in from Microsoft Outlook for a classic Outlook desktop app​
1. **Open the classic Outlook desktop app**.
2. **Open the Add-ins for Outlook page**.
Depending on the Outlook version you have installed, use one of the following ways:
* Go to the Outlook ribbon → click **File** → **Manage Add-ins**. This opens new Outlook Web and displays the **Add-Ins for Outlook** tab (Fig. 5).
Fig. 5 Add-Ins for Outlook tab
![Fig. 5 Add-Ins for Outlook tab](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_add_ins_for_outlook_window.png)
* Go to the Outlook navigation panel → click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.2/icn_more_apps_classic.png) → **Add Apps**. This opens the **Apps** page (Fig. 1).
3. **Find the Creatio.ai add-in**.
* If you open the **Add-ins for Outlook** from the ribbon, go to the **Search add-ins** field → enter the "Creatio.ai" search query → select the **Creatio.ai** add-in. This opens the **Creatio.ai add-in** window (Fig. 6).
Fig. 6 Creatio.ai add-in window
![Fig. 6 Creatio.ai add-in window](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_ai_add_in_window.png)
* If you open the **Add-ins for Outlook** from the navigation panel, go to the **Search apps and more** field → enter the "Creatio.ai" search query → select the **Creatio.ai** add-in. This opens the **Creatio.ai add-in** window (Fig. 2).
4. **Click Add**. The installation might take some time.
**As a result** , the "Creatio.ai" group that includes the **Creatio.ai Agent** button will be added to the following tabs:
* The **Home** tab on the Outlook ribbon (Fig. 7). Use Creatio.ai when working with a single email in the message list.
Fig. 7 Creatio.ai add-in on the Home tab
![Fig. 7 Creatio.ai add-in on the Home tab](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_add_in_on_the_home_tab.png)
* The **Message** tab on the **New email** window (Fig. 8). Use Creatio.ai when working with a single email in a separate window.
Fig. 8 Creatio.ai add-in in the New email window
![Fig. 8 Creatio.ai add-in in the New email window](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_add_in_in_the_message_window.png)
* The **Meeting** tab on the **New meeting** window (Fig. 9). Use Creatio.ai when working with a single meeting in a separate window.
Fig. 9 Creatio.ai add-in in the New meeting window
![Fig. 9 Creatio.ai add-in in the New meeting window](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_add_in_in_the_new_meeting_window.png)
* The **Appointment** tab on the **New appointment** window (Fig. 10). Use Creatio.ai when working with a single appointment in a separate window.
Fig. 10 Creatio.ai add-in in the New appointment window
![Fig. 10 Creatio.ai add-in in the New appointment window](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_add_in_in_the_new_appointment_window.png)
### Install Creatio.ai add-in directly from Microsoft Marketplace​
1. **Open the** [Microsoft Marketplace](https://marketplace.microsoft.com/en-us/).
2. Go to the **Search Marketplace** field → enter "Creatio.ai" → select the **Creatio.ai** add-in. This opens the add-in page (Fig. 11).
Fig. 11 Creatio.ai window
![Fig. 11 Creatio.ai window](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_ai_add_in_page_in_the_microsoft_marketplace.png)
3. **Click Get it now**.
4. **Confirm the installation**.
5. **Log in to Microsoft account** using your credentials if needed.
The installation might take some time.
**As a result** :
* The **Creatio.ai** add-in will be added to the **Apps** page (Fig. 3).
* The "Creatio.ai" group that includes the **Creatio.ai** button will be added to the **Event** tab on the **new event** window (Fig. 4).
## 2\. Grant Microsoft Outlook access to Creatio​
1. **Open any Outlook version** to grant access to Creatio.
2. **Open the Outlook task pane** that includes Creatio login page (Fig. 12).
* For **new Outlook desktop app or Outlook Web** , open a single email → click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.2/icn_more_apps_classic.png) → select the **Creatio.ai** add-in.
* For a **classic Outlook desktop app** , open a single email → go to the **Message** tab → go to the "Creatio.ai" group → click the **Creatio.ai Agent** button.
Fig. 13 Outlook task pane
![Fig. 13 Outlook task pane](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_ai_task_panel.png)
3. **Log in to Creatio**.
1. Click **Sign in with Microsoft**.
2. Enter the Creatio URL and click **Continue**.
3. Click **Sign in to...**. This displays Creatio login page.
4. Use your credentials to log in. This displays consent page (Fig. 13).
Fig. 14 Consent page
![Fig. 14 Consent page](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Setup_and_Administration/setup_oauth20_for_external_apps/8.3/scr_consent_page.png)
4. **Click Accept**. This opens the Creatio.ai chat panel in the Outlook task pane (Fig. 14).
Fig. 15 Creatio.ai chat panel
![Fig. 15 Creatio.ai chat panel](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/NoCode_Customization/creatio_ai_for_outlook/8.3/scr_creatio_ai_chat_panel.png)
**As a result** , Outlook will be connected to Creatio and you will be able to interact with Creatio.ai directly from Outlook (Fig. 15).
Fig. 16 Interaction with Creatio.ai directly from Outlook
![Fig. 16 Interaction with Creatio.ai directly from Outlook](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Setup_and_Administration/setup_oauth20_for_external_apps/8.3/scr_external_app.png)
* * *

Install Creatio.ai add-in from Microsoft Outlook for a new Outlook desktop app or Outlook Web​
Install Creatio.ai add-in from Microsoft Outlook for a classic Outlook desktop app​
Install Creatio.ai add-in directly from Microsoft Marketplace​
2. Grant Microsoft Outlook access to Creatio​
